data.description: An advanced interface to the DBI
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The DBX modules utilize the DBI, but the DBI:: namespace is
    reserved (or so I am led to believe). Also, it doesn't quite fit
    into DBIx because it should be a whole package. That is, you should
    be able to simply say use DBX; instead of DBIx::DBX.
